abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton continues to face questions on campaign trail about private email server she set up as Sec of State, but New Hampshire speech highlights women's achievements, underscoring potential historical significance of her presidency.
lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton said Saturday that everyone involved in the investigation into her email practices as secretary of state should cooperate and insisted that she was running her campaign with joy even as that controversy hounds her.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Urges Cooperation on Inquiry Into Her Emails, as She Finds Joy Elsewhere
headline.print_headline: Clinton Urges Cooperation on Inquiry Into Her Emails, as She Finds Joy Elsewhere

snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton said Saturday that everyone involved in the investigation into her email practices as secretary of state should cooperate and insisted that she was running her campaign with joy even as that controversy hounds her.
